#!/bin/bash
cd ~/Desktop/claude_master

OUTPUT="claude_master_complete_inventory.txt"
echo "🗂️ CLAUDE MASTER COMPLETE APP INVENTORY" > $OUTPUT
echo "Generated: $(date)" >> $OUTPUT
echo "========================================" >> $OUTPUT
echo "" >> $OUTPUT

COUNT=1
for dir in */; do
    if [ -d "$dir" ]; then
        echo "" >> $OUTPUT
        echo "=== APP #$COUNT: ${dir%/} ===" >> $OUTPUT
        echo "" >> $OUTPUT
        
        # Directory structure
        echo "📁 Structure:" >> $OUTPUT
        ls -la "$dir" | head -30 >> $OUTPUT
        echo "" >> $OUTPUT
        
        # package.json if exists
        if [ -f "${dir}package.json" ]; then
            echo "📦 package.json:" >> $OUTPUT
            cat "${dir}package.json" >> $OUTPUT
            echo "" >> $OUTPUT
        fi
        
        # README if exists
        if [ -f "${dir}README.md" ]; then
            echo "📖 README.md (first 50 lines):" >> $OUTPUT
            head -50 "${dir}README.md" >> $OUTPUT
            echo "" >> $OUTPUT
        fi
        
        # Check for replit config
        if [ -f "${dir}.replit" ]; then
            echo "🔧 .replit config:" >> $OUTPUT
            cat "${dir}.replit" >> $OUTPUT
            echo "" >> $OUTPUT
        fi
        
        COUNT=$((COUNT + 1))
    fi
done

echo "✅ Inventory complete! Saved to: $OUTPUT"
echo "📊 Total apps cataloged: $((COUNT - 1))"

#!/bin/bash
# HotStack Sovereign Cluster - Automated Provisioning
# File: provision-cluster.sh

set -e  # Exit on error

# Configuration
HETZNER_API_TOKEN="${HETZNER_API_TOKEN}"
PROJECT_NAME="hotstack-sovereign-cluster"
LOCATION="fsn1"  # Falkenstein, Germany
SERVER_TYPE="cpx11"
IMAGE="ubuntu-24.04"
SSH_KEY_NAME="hotstack-admin-key"

# Color output
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
BLUE='\033[0;34m'
RED='\033[0;31m'
NC='\033[0m' # No Color

echo -e "${BLUE}🔥 HotStack Sovereign Cluster Provisioning${NC}"
echo "=========================================="

# Check if API token is set
if [ -z "$HETZNER_API_TOKEN" ]; then
    echo -e "${RED}ERROR: HETZNER_API_TOKEN not set${NC}"
    echo "Generate token at: https://console.hetzner.cloud/"
    exit 1
fi

# Function to create server
create_server() {
    local name=$1
    local role=$2
    
    echo -e "${GREEN}Creating: $name ($role)${NC}"
    
    curl -s -X POST \
        -H "Authorization: Bearer $HETZNER_API_TOKEN" \
        -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
        -d "{
            \"name\": \"$name\",
            \"server_type\": \"$SERVER_TYPE\",
            \"location\": \"$LOCATION\",
            \"image\": \"$IMAGE\",
            \"ssh_keys\": [\"$SSH_KEY_NAME\"],
            \"labels\": {
                \"role\": \"$role\",
                \"cluster\": \"hotstack-sovereign\"
            }
        }" \
        https://api.hetzner.cloud/v1/servers | jq -r '.server.public_net.ipv4.ip'
}

# Create 4-node cluster
echo ""
echo "Provisioning nodes..."
MANAGER_IP=$(create_server "hotstack-hub-manager-01" "manager")
WORKER2_IP=$(create_server "hotstack-hub-worker-02" "worker")
WORKER3_IP=$(create_server "hotstack-hub-worker-03" "worker")
WORKER4_IP=$(create_server "hotstack-hub-worker-04" "worker")

echo ""
echo -e "${GREEN}✅ Cluster Provisioned Successfully${NC}"
echo "===================================="
echo "Manager: $MANAGER_IP"
echo "Worker 2: $WORKER2_IP"
echo "Worker 3: $WORKER3_IP"
echo "Worker 4: $WORKER4_IP"
echo ""
echo "Next: Install Coolify on Manager node"
echo "Command: ssh root@$MANAGER_IP"

#!/bin/bash
# BuildNest Discovery Protocol - Full System Scan
# Save as: discover-buildnest.sh

echo "🔥 BUILDNEST DISCOVERY PROTOCOL - INITIATED"
echo "==========================================="
echo ""

# Create output directory
OUTPUT_DIR="$HOME/Desktop/BUILDNEST-DISCOVERY-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S)"
mkdir -p "$OUTPUT_DIR"

echo "📊 Results will be saved to: $OUTPUT_DIR"
echo ""

# 1. SEARCH GOOGLE DRIVE (Primary Target)
echo "🔍 Phase 1: Scanning Google Drive..."
find "$HOME/Library/CloudStorage" -type d \( -iname "*healthtrack*" -o -iname "*buildnest*" -o -iname "*omni*" \) 2>/dev/null | tee "$OUTPUT_DIR/google-drive-directories.txt"
find "$HOME/Library/CloudStorage" -type f \( -iname "*healthtrack*" -o -iname "*buildnest*" -o -iname "*omni*" \) 2>/dev/null | tee "$OUTPUT_DIR/google-drive-files.txt"

# 2. SEARCH ENTIRE MAC (Secondary Scan)
echo ""
echo "🔍 Phase 2: Scanning entire Mac filesystem..."
find "$HOME" -type d \( -iname "*healthtrack*" -o -iname "*buildnest*" -o -iname "*omni*" \) 2>/dev/null | grep -v "node_modules" | grep -v ".git" | tee "$OUTPUT_DIR/mac-directories.txt"
find "$HOME" -type f \( -iname "*healthtrack*" -o -iname "*buildnest*" -o -iname "*omni*" \) 2>/dev/null | grep -v "node_modules" | grep -v ".git" | tee "$OUTPUT_DIR/mac-files.txt"

# 3. SEARCH FOR REPLIT-SPECIFIC FILES
echo ""
echo "🔍 Phase 3: Searching for Replit app signatures..."
find "$HOME" -type f -name ".replit" 2>/dev/null | tee "$OUTPUT_DIR/replit-apps.txt"

# 4. SEARCH FOR OMNI VARIATIONS
echo ""
echo "🔍 Phase 4: Deep scan for OMNI variations..."
find "$HOME/Library/CloudStorage" \( -iname "*hsomni*" -o -iname "*omni9000*" -o -iname "*omnidrop*" -o -iname "*omnicast*" \) 2>/dev/null | tee "$OUTPUT_DIR/omni-variations.txt"

# 5. COUNT RESULTS
echo ""
echo "📊 DISCOVERY SUMMARY:"
echo "===================="
echo "Google Drive Directories: $(wc -l < "$OUTPUT_DIR/google-drive-directories.txt" | tr -d ' ')"
echo "Google Drive Files: $(wc -l < "$OUTPUT_DIR/google-drive-files.txt" | tr -d ' ')"
echo "Mac Directories: $(wc -l < "$OUTPUT_DIR/mac-directories.txt" | tr -d ' ')"
echo "Mac Files: $(wc -l < "$OUTPUT_DIR/mac-files.txt" | tr -d ' ')"
echo "Replit Apps: $(wc -l < "$OUTPUT_DIR/replit-apps.txt" | tr -d ' ')"
echo "OMNI Variations: $(wc -l < "$OUTPUT_DIR/omni-variations.txt" | tr -d ' ')"
echo ""
echo "✅ Complete results saved to: $OUTPUT_DIR"

# 6. GENERATE MASTER INDEX
cat > "$OUTPUT_DIR/MASTER-INDEX.md" << 'EOF'
# BUILDNEST DISCOVERY REPORT

## Search Parameters
- Keywords: healthtrack, buildnest, omni, hsomni, omni9000, omnidrop, omnicast
- Scope: Google Drive + Full Mac filesystem
- Exclusions: node_modules, .git directories

## Results Files
- `google-drive-directories.txt` - All matching directories in Google Drive
- `google-drive-files.txt` - All matching files in Google Drive

#!/bin/bash
# Gorilla Comb Ant Nest Provisioning
# 4-Node Hetzner Cluster with Trinity DNA

set -e

HETZNER_API_TOKEN="${HETZNER_API_TOKEN}"
if [ -z "$HETZNER_API_TOKEN" ]; then
    echo "❌ Error: HETZNER_API_TOKEN not set"
    echo "Run: export HETZNER_API_TOKEN='your-token'"
    exit 1
fi

echo "🦍 GORILLA COMB - ANT NEST PROVISIONING"
echo "========================================"
echo ""

# SSH Key (create if doesn't exist)
if [ ! -f ~/.ssh/hotstack_deploy ]; then
    echo "🔑 Generating SSH key..."
    ssh-keygen -t ed25519 -f ~/.ssh/hotstack_deploy -N "" -C "hotstack-deploy"
fi

SSH_KEY=$(cat ~/.ssh/hotstack_deploy.pub)

# Upload SSH key to Hetzner
echo "📤 Uploading SSH key to Hetzner..."
SSH_KEY_ID=$(curl -s -X POST \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer $HETZNER_API_TOKEN" \
    -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
    -d "{\"name\":\"hotstack-gorilla-comb\",\"public_key\":\"$SSH_KEY\"}" \
    https://api.hetzner.cloud/v1/ssh_keys | jq -r '.ssh_key.id')

echo "✅ SSH Key ID: $SSH_KEY_ID"
echo ""

# Create servers
create_server() {
    local name=$1
    local role=$2
    
    echo "🐜 Creating ant: $name ($role)..."
    
    RESPONSE=$(curl -s -X POST \
        -H "Authorization: Bearer $HETZNER_API_TOKEN" \
        -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
        -d "{
            \"name\": \"$name\",
            \"server_type\": \"cpx11\",
            \"location\": \"fsn1\",
            \"image\": \"ubuntu-24.04\",
            \"ssh_keys\": [$SSH_KEY_ID],
            \"labels\": {
                \"role\": \"$role\",
                \"nest\": \"gorilla-comb\"
            }
        }" \
        https://api.hetzner.cloud/v1/servers)
    
    IP=$(echo $RESPONSE | jq -r '.server.public_net.ipv4.ip')
    echo "✅ $name: $IP"
    echo "$name,$role,$IP" >> ~/Desktop/gorilla-comb-cluster.csv
}

# Remove old cluster file
rm -f ~/Desktop/gorilla-comb-cluster.csv
echo "name,role,ip" > ~/Desktop/gorilla-comb-cluster.csv

# Provision 4 nodes (the ant nest)

echo ""

create_server "hotstack-queen-01" "queen"
sleep 2
create_server "hotstack-worker-02" "worker"
sleep 2
create_server "hotstack-worker-03" "worker"
sleep 2
create_server "hotstack-worker-04" "worker"
